KPK Apresiasi Pemkot Kendari, Berlakukan Alat Perekam Pajak Online
04 Nov 2019, 15:53 by Gafar, S.I.P.


KPK Apresiasi Pemkot Kendari, Berlakukan Alat Perekam Pajak Online

KBRN,Kendari: Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) mengapresiasi pemerintah Kota Kendari yang telah memberlakukan pemasangan alat perekam pajak secara online, disetiap meja kasir.“Kami mengapresiasi upaya pemerintah kota Kendari yang telah menerapkan Alat perekam pajak atau Tapping Box di setiap meja kasir,” ungkap Adlinasyah Malik Nasution, Koordinator Wilayah VIII Koordinasi dan Supervisi Pencegahan KPK, Senin (04/11/2019).Menurut Adlinasyah, alat perekam pajak tersebut dapat mencatat semua pembelian atau transaksi secara online, baik di hotel-hotel-restoran, tempat hiburan,rumah makan maupun warung–warung kopi.“Sejak diberlakukanya alat perekam pajak tersebut, Penerimaan Asli Daerah kota kendari melonjak hingga 200 persen,” ujar Adlinasyah.Namun berbeda dengan Adlinasyah Malik Nasution, salah seorang pemilik kedai kopi H. Anto, meminta pemerintah kota kendari, untuk tidak menerapkan pemasangan alat perekam pajak tersebut di semua tempat kuliner.“Tidak semua rumah makan maupun kedai kopi di kendari ini, memiliki penghasilan sama. Jadi jangan digeneralisasi dikenakan pajak 10 persen,” tutur H. Anto.Karena itu, para pengusaha kuliner mengusulkan, agar perlu dilakukan klasifikasi terhadap jenis-jenis usaha kuliner yang layak atau tidak layak diberlakukan pemasangan alat perekam pajak 10 persen.Sebelumnya, sejumlah pengusaha rumah makan dan kedai kopi di kota Kendari, mengaku resah dengan kebijakan pemerintah kota, yang menerapkan pajak 10 persen denghan pemasangan alat perekam pajak di kasir pembelian.Pemberlakukan pajak 10 persen bagi restoran atau sejenisnya tersebut, telah diatur dalam peraturan daerah kota kendari nomor 2 tahun 2011 tentang pajak daerah, dan mulai diberlakukan terhitung januari 2019.Subjek pajak restoran yang dimaksud adalah orang pribadi atau badan yang membeli makanan dan atau minuman dari restorsan, rumah makan, kafetaria, kantin, warung dan sejenisnya.Dalam penerapan pajak itu, dinas pendapatan daerah kota Kendari, mamasang Tapping Box di setiap meja kasir, sehingga setiap proses pembelian, dapat diketahui secara online.

KPK Appreciates Kendari City Government, Applies Online Tax Recorder Tool
04 Nov 2019, 15:53 by Gafar, S.I.P.


KPK Appreciates Kendari City Government, Applies Online Tax Recorder Tool

KBRN, Kendari: Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) appreciates the Kendari City government, which has implemented an online tax recording device, at every cash register. "We appreciate the efforts of the Kendari city government that has implemented a tax recording device or Tapping Box on each cash register," said Adlinasyah Malik Nasution, Region VIII Coordinator of the KPK Prevention Coordination and Supervision, Monday (11/04/2019). According to Adlinasyah, the tax recording device can record all purchases or transactions online, both in hotels, restaurants, entertainment venues, "Since the enactment of the tax recording device, the Original Revenue of the Kendari city has jumped by 200 percent," said Adlinasyah. However, it is different from Adlinasyah Malik Nasution, one of the owners of the H. Anto coffee shop, asking the local government of Kendari , not to implement the installation of the tax recording devices in all culinary places. "Not all restaurants want Even this coffee shop in Kendari has the same income. So do not be generalized subject to a tax of 10 percent, "said H. Anto.Because of that, culinary entrepreneurs propose, that it is necessary to do a classification of the types of culinary businesses that are feasible or not feasible to install a 10 percent tax recording device. Previously, a number of home entrepreneurs eating and coffee shops in Kendari, claiming to be uneasy with the policy of the city government, which imposed a 10 percent tax by installing a tax recording device at the cashier of the purchase. Imposing a 10 percent tax on restaurants or the like, has been regulated in the local regulation of the Kendari city number 2 of 2011 regarding local taxes, and came into force as of January 2019. The restaurant tax subject referred to is an individual or entity that buys food and or drinks from restaurants, restaurants, cafeterias, canteens, stalls and the like. In the application of that tax, the municipal revenue service Kendari, installed Tapping Boxes on each cashier's table, so that every buyer processes and, can be known online.
